Lines.Speech: [i]You creep around the giant spider that's focused on making Yuu its next meal.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Good choice, Boss. More money for you at the end of this ordeal. _Oh_ by the way. _I checked the calendar, my personality service isn't due until next year.
[i]A muffled scream reverberates around the cave as you make your way out of the webs.
